verses.verse: בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year הַ֠תְּשִׁעִית <WH8671> In the ninth לְצִדְקִיָּ֨הוּ <WH6667> of Zedekiah מֶלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> of Judah בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָעֲשִׂרִ֗י <WH6224> in the tenth בָּ֠א <WH935> came נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֨ר <WH5019> Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֤ל <WH894> of Babylon וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all חֵילוֹ֙ <WH2428> and all his army אֶל־ <WH413> about יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> against Jerusalem וַיָּצֻ֖רוּ <WH6696> and they besieged עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> and ס

בְּעַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <WH6249> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> year לְצִדְקִיָּ֔הוּ <WH6667> of Zedekiah בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרְבִיעִ֖י <WH7243> in the fourth בְּתִשְׁעָ֣ה <WH8672> the ninth לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month הָבְקְעָ֖ה <WH1234> was broken up הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> the city

וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <WH935> came in כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> all שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> And all the princes מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> and sat בְּשַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate הַתָּ֑וֶךְ <WH8432> in the middle נֵרְגַ֣ל שַׂר־ אֶ֠צֶר <WH5371> [even] Nergalsharezer סַֽמְגַּר־ נְב֞וּ <WH5562> Samgarnebo שַׂר־ סְכִ֣ים <WH8310> Sarsechim רַב־ סָרִ֗יס <WH7249> Rabsaris נֵרְגַ֤ל שַׂר־ אֶ֙צֶר֙ <WH5371> Nergalsharezer רַב־ מָ֔ג <WH7248> Rabmag וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all שְׁאֵרִ֔ית <WH7611> with all the residue שָׂרֵ֖י <WH8269> of the princes מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> of Babylon

וַיְהִ֡י <WH1961> become כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after רָ֠אָם <WH7200> saw צִדְקִיָּ֨הוּ <WH6667> And it came to pass [that] when Zedekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> of Judah וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> and all אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> them and all the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <WH4421> of war וַֽ֠יִּבְרְחוּ <WH1272> then they fled וַיֵּצְא֨וּ <WH3318> and went forth לַ֤יְלָה <WH3915> by night מִן־ <WH4480> out הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> out of the city דֶּ֚רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way גַּ֣ן <WH1588> garden הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's בְּשַׁ֖עַר <WH8179> by the gate בֵּ֣ין <WH996> between הַחֹמֹתָ֑יִם <WH2346> betwixt the two walls וַיֵּצֵ֖א <WH3318> and he went out דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> the way הָעֲרָבָֽה׃ <WH6160> of the plain

וַיִּרְדְּפ֨וּ <WH7291> pursued חֵיל־ <WH2428> army כַּשְׂדִּ֜ים <WH3778> But the Chaldeans' אַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ם <WH310> after וַיַּשִּׂ֣גוּ <WH5381> them and overtook אֶת־ <WH853> צִדְקִיָּהוּ֮ <WH6667> Zedekiah בְּעַֽרְב֣וֹת <WH6160> in the plains יְרֵחוֹ֒ <WH3405> of Jericho וַיִּקְח֣וּ <WH3947> and when they had taken אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> וַֽ֠יַּעֲלֻהוּ <WH5927> him they brought him up אֶל־ <WH413> to נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֧ר <WH5019> to Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֛ל <WH894> of Babylon רִבְלָ֖תָה <WH7247> to Riblah בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land חֲמָ֑ת <WH2574> of Hamath וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> where he gave אִתּ֖וֹ <WH853> מִשְׁפָּטִֽים׃ <WH4941> judgment

וַיִּשְׁחַט֩ <WH7819> slew מֶ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king בָּבֶ֜ל <WH894> of Babylon אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> the sons צִדְקִיָּ֛הוּ <WH6667> of Zedekiah בְּרִבְלָ֖ה <WH7247> in Riblah לְעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> before his eyes וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֹרֵ֣י <WH2715> all the nobles יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah שָׁחַ֖ט <WH7819> slew מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> also the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> of Babylon

וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> eyes צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH6667> Zedekiah's עִוֵּ֑ר <WH5786> Moreover he put out וַיַּאַסְרֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH631> and bound בַּֽנְחֻשְׁתַּ֔יִם <WH5178> him with chains לָבִ֥יא <WH935> to carry אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <WH894> him to Babylon

וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king's וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> and the houses הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people שָׂרְפ֥וּ <WH8313> burned הַכַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <WH3778> And the Chaldeans בָּאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> with fire וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֹמ֥וֹת <WH2346> the walls יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem נָתָֽצוּ׃ <WH5422> and brake down

וְאֵת֩ <WH853> יֶ֨תֶר <WH3499> the remnant הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> of the people הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֣ים <WH7604> that remained בָּעִ֗יר <WH5892> in the city וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנֹּֽפְלִים֙ <WH5307> and those that fell away אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who נָפְל֣וּ <WH5307> that fell עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> יֶ֥תֶר <WH3499> to him with the rest הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of the people הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֑ים <WH7604> that remained הֶגְלָ֛ה <WH1540> carried away captive נְבֽוּזַר־ אֲדָ֥ן <WH5018> Then Nebuzaradan רַב־ <WH7227> the captain טַבָּחִ֖ים <WH2876> of the guard בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> into Babylon

וּמִן־ <WH4480> some הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> of the people הַדַּלִּ֗ים <WH1800> of the poor אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who אֵין־ <WH369> had לָהֶם֙ מְא֔וּמָה <WH3972> which had nothing הִשְׁאִ֛יר <WH7604> left נְבוּזַרְאֲדָ֥ן <WH5018> But Nebuzaradan רַב־ <WH7227> the captain טַבָּחִ֖ים <WH2876> of the guard בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and gave לָהֶ֛ם כְּרָמִ֥ים <WH3754> them vineyards וִֽיגֵבִ֖ים <WH3010> and fields בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> at the same time הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיְצַ֛ו <WH6680> gave charge נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֥ר <WH5019> Now Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon עַֽל־ <WH5921> about יִרְמְיָ֑הוּ <WH3414> concerning Jeremiah בְּיַ֛ד <WH3027> to נְבוּזַרְאֲדָ֥ן <WH5018> Nebuzaradan רַב־ <WH7227> the captain טַבָּחִ֖ים <WH2876> of the guard לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

קָחֶ֗נּוּ <WH3947> Take וְעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5869> affliction שִׂ֣ים <WH7760> appoint עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> after וְאַל־ <WH408> nay תַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> to him and do ל֖וֹ מְא֣וּמָה <WH3972> fault רָּ֑ע <WH7451> harmful כִּ֗י <WH3588> for [אִם <WH518> lo כ] כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> he יְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> unto him even as he shall say אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> about כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that עֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH6213> but do עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with

וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <WH7971> sent נְבֽוּזַרְאֲדָ֣ן <WH5018> So Nebuzaradan רַב־ <WH7227> the captain טַבָּחִ֗ים <WH2876> of the guard וּנְבֽוּשַׁזְבָּן֙ <WH5021> and Nebushasban רַב־ סָרִ֔יס <WH7249> Rabsaris וְנֵרְגַ֥ל שַׂר־ אֶ֖צֶר <WH5371> and Nergalsharezer רַב־ מָ֑ג <WH7248> Rabmag וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and all רַבֵּ֥י <WH7227> princes מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> and all the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> of Babylon's

וַיִּשְׁלְחוּ֩ <WH7971> Even they sent וַיִּקְח֨וּ <WH3947> and took אֶֽת־ <WH853> יִרְמְיָ֜הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah מֵחֲצַ֣ר <WH2691> out of the court הַמַּטָּרָ֗ה <WH4307> of the prison וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> and committed אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to גְּדַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH1436> him unto Gedaliah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיקָ֣ם <WH296> of Ahikam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁפָ֔ן <WH8227> of Shaphan לְהוֹצִאֵ֖הוּ <WH3318> that he should carry אֶל־ <WH413> about הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> him home וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> so he dwelt בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> among הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> the people ס

וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> came unto Jeremiah הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> had come דְבַר־ <WH1697> Now the word יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD בִּֽהְיֹת֣וֹ <WH1961> had come עָצ֔וּר <WH6113> while he was shut up בַּחֲצַ֥ר <WH2691> in the court הַמַּטָּרָ֖ה <WH4307> of the prison לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

הָל֣וֹךְ <WH1980> Go וְאָמַרְתָּ֡ <WH559> and speak לְעֶבֶד־ מֶ֨לֶךְ <WH5663> to Ebedmelech הַכּוּשִׁ֜י <WH3569> the Ethiopian לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הִנְנִי֩ <WH2005> behold [מֵבִי כ] (מֵבִ֨יא <WH935> abide ק) אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרַ֜י <WH1697> my words אֶל־ <WH413> about הָעִ֥יר <WH5892> upon this city הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> for לְרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> for evil וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> for לְטוֹבָ֑ה <WH2896> and not for good וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> will take לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> before בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> and they shall be [accomplished] in that day הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> I

וְהִצַּלְתִּ֥יךָ <WH5337> But I will deliver בַיּוֹם־ <WH3117> thee in that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> and you תִנָּתֵן֙ <WH5414> and thou shalt not be given בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> into the hand הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> of the men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you יָג֖וֹר <WH3016> thou [art] afraid מִפְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> of whom

כִּ֤י <WH3588> because מַלֵּט֙ <WH4422> For I will surely אֲמַלֶּטְךָ֔ <WH4422> deliver וּבַחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> by the sword לֹ֣א <WH3808> and you will not תִפֹּ֑ל <WH5307> thee and thou shalt not fall וְהָיְתָ֨ה <WH1961> will have לְךָ֤ נַפְשְׁךָ֙ <WH5315> but thy life לְשָׁלָ֔ל <WH7998> shall be for a prey כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because בָטַ֥חְתָּ <WH982> unto thee because thou hast put thy trust בִּ֖י נְאֻם־ <WH5002> in me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס
